text: Parent - shaming is a mainstay of social media and, on occasion, can actually be helpful. If a commenter tells a celebrity ( or a friend ) not to do something that might hurt their kid, well, that ’ s useful. However, the comments section of many celebrity fathers ’ accounts are full of deeply unhelpful advice. Take, for instance, Justin Timberlake ’ s account, which now features a photo of his son, Silas Timberlake, kissing his mom, Jessica Biel, followed by a mass of comments about the length of his son ’ s hair. According to internet busybodies — mostly male and mostly very certain of their views — having long hair is going to somehow damage the kid long - term.
